published_versions.release_notes:
- New Next Line action cycles through a text file and output the next line on every keypress
- Both Next Line and Random Line actions now support outputting to clipboard
- New Regex Display action parses a text file for a regex and displays the match on key.
- Both Regex Display and Last Word Display support Auto Stopping the Flashing Alert when the text no longer matches.

published_versions.description: VoiceMeeter integration and live feedback. Includes Dials, Hotkey and MIDI Support
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added `Title` support for Microphone action

✦ Added support for new Stream Deck SDK

published_versions.subtitle: VoiceMeeter integration and live feedback.
published_versions.description: VoiceMeeter integration and live feedback. Includes Dials, Hotkey and MIDI Support
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Advanced Queries Support - The Advanced Toggle action's Mode1 Check now supports performing complex queries with == and != as well as AND/OR. Example: Strip[0].Mute AND Strip[1].Gain==7.5 AND Strip[2].device.name!="Elgato Wave"

✦ Stream Deck+ Support

✦ New Gain Adjust action allows you to control the volume of a Strip/Bus from the Dials. Pressing the dial will toggle mute.

✦ New Setting Adjust action allows you to control the main dials (Comp/Gate/Denoiser/Reverb/Delay...) from the Dials.

✦ The topmost "Title" property has been disabled and you can now use the (lower) Title Property's -User Defined- logic to put a manual title using the  Title Prefix field

✦ 64bit runtime optimization with VoiceMeeter's DLLs

published_versions.subtitle: Set a timer on your Stream Deck
published_versions.description:
Set a timer on your Stream Deck, and have it shown on your Stream too. Will start flashing in a color of your choice when the time is up.Includes sound support & Streamathon mode (increase/decrease the time left on every key press)
New: Focus Timer - Alternate between work & break cycles to mange your time and get things done.
published_versions.release_notes:
`Date/Time Countdown` action - Let's you countdown to a specific date or time.

Added a new `Format` setting which allows you to customize the timer displayed on key (and file).

Added support for timer Prefix on keys

Both File Prefix and Key Prefix support newlines

Now customizable if timer starts counting up or not when timer ends

Minor bug fixes

published_versions.release_notes:
Bug Fixes

- Fix bug in adding "\n" for new-lines in title
- Fix HWiNFO.exe detection (.exe vs .EXE change in process)

New

- Complete overhaul of infrastructure
- Hardware monitoring service made generic (to allow future support for AIDA64 and the like)
- Moved close-source portions to separate HWiNFO service provider that feeds the plugin sensor reading data
- Plugin source separated, to be open-sourced here and other repos
- Separation of plugin and data providers to allow remote machine monitoring (testing phase)

published_versions.subtitle: Control TotalMix FX with StreamDeck!
published_versions.description: Control TotalMix FX with StreamDeck! Features: (rather complete) OSC and (limited) MIDI implementation. Load snapshots/mixes, toggle mute/solo globally and on individual channels, change channel volume, pan, gain, phase, cue, width, control master out and many other settings. Visit the project Github-site linked below to view a full manual!
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Reworked the Mirror function to make it more robust, quicker, less resource intensive, and compatible with Windows 11 

✦ Added multiple additional icons to make actions more clear (less using the default "Mixer"-style logo, which made different actions look the same) 

✦ Track channel names as set in TotalMix are reflected on the StreamDeck to make it easier to distinguish buttons.

✦ Made track/channel name display optional but the default for all actions 

✦ Phantom Power can now be mirrored and moved to Trigger Channel Functions 

✦ Windows 11 related issues are fixed now. 

✦ Plugin (or at least mirroring) stopping working after it ran a while is fixed now. 

✦ Mirroring is now globally enabled for the plugin by default. 

✦ Removed the option to mirror single buttons from the UI to unclutter the menu.

✦ Snapshot names will be read from the local TotalMix config file as they are not transmitted via OSC 

✦ Added checks for TotalMix being unreachable

✦ Support for more than 16 channels! 

✦ During button load, the plugin now tries to determine how many channels the interface offers (which is rather what the user set in the "faders per bank" setting in TotalMix OSC setup) and offers only these channels in the plugin 

✦ Fixed some less common actions from sending the wrong value.

published_versions.subtitle: Mix It Up is a bot unlike any other with an amazing team of developers working around the clock
published_versions.description: Mix It Up is a bot unlike any other with an amazing team of developers working around the clock to bring the absolute best features our community members have requested. We are one of the most feature-packed Mixer bots out there which provides streamers with a wide and versitile set of tools to help make your streams visually and interactively appealing to your audience. This plug-in allows you to run Mix It Up commands at the touch of a button.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, NRPN, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Fixed a problem where the Midi driver, in rare cases, truncated port names.

✦ Fixed a problem where the plugin failed to start on systems with missing name resolution for "localhost".

✦ Fixed a problem where icon images for press and tap icons were not correctly displayed in the editor.

✦ Fixed a problem where the Control Change button crashed when loading a very old profile.

✦ Added an option for "send fader touch" on Mackie dials.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ The Control Change fader and Vpot actions have min/max values.

✦ The Script Sysex action can take variable references.

✦ The Script button now has a "key" action that sends keystrokes to the active window.

✦ Bug fixes, primarily for the Previous/Next Channel functionality in the Mackie Control button and dial.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ The Control Change fader and Vpot actions have min/max values.

✦ The Script Sysex action can take variable references.

✦ The Script button now has a "key" action that sends keystrokes to the active window.

✦ Bug fixes, primarily for the Previous/Next Channel functionality in the Mackie Control button and dial.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ The state management for the Note On/Off action, which got somewhat mangled by the 3.5 update, is fixed.

✦ The Sysex Toggle button didn't send message 2. This is now fixed.

✦ Support for Channel Pressure messages is added to the Script button.

✦ Support for advanced math expressions is added to the Script button.

✦ An option to send only MSB or LSB for bank select is added.

✦ The loading page is less intrusive.

✦ Bug fixes.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ NRPN support.

✦ All dials have a "screen tap action" that can be triggered by tapping the screen.

✦ All dials can show state icons for both press and tap actions.

✦ By altering the graphics, the Multi Midi and Multi Mackie dials with faders can show the mute state.

✦ Multi Midi and Multi Mackie dials now have graphical display options for "Rotate while pressed".

✦ The Script button has a larger script area, which can be resized.

✦ Bug fixes.

✦ Tabbed interface for multi items. 

✦ Dynamic step size for dials.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
The Control Change action now has a V-pot button type.

The Mackie Control action now has an alternate selection of button graphics (same as the CC action). 

The Scrub wheel button is fixed.

It now handles the case where the daw sends a Note Off message (instead of the expected Note On with velocity 0) to switch a button off.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
Significantly better performance when many buttons change state at the same time.
  The Note On/Off action can now play "chords" with an unlimited number of notes.
  The Control Change action configured as a cycle button could inadvertently change direction if pressed multiple times quickly; this is now fixed.
  Stability and performance improvements.
  This minor update is built without .Net 6.0 so it works on older macOS versions
  Bug fixes.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
Significantly better performance when many buttons change state at the same time.
  The Note On/Off action can now play "chords" with an unlimited number of notes.
  The Control Change action configured as a cycle button could inadvertently change direction if pressed multiple times quickly; this is now fixed.
  Stability and performance improvements.
  Bug fixes.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes: Better state management for the Control Change action when used in a Multi-Action button.  Custom files can be used for dB value display on fader buttons (Mackie Control and Control Change).

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes: The Control Change action can show fader graphics in the same way as the Mackie Control action. A bug in the Mackie Control action is fixed; the plugin sent the wrong midi commands for "Fader touch".

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
Fader buttons can display a new set of "mixer-like" faders as well as custom fader images. Fader buttons can be "linked" so that one button shows the lower half of the fader and the other the upper half. Channel buttons can be assigned to the selected track in addition to tracks 1-8.

Channel buttons can display track names. Transport buttons changed to better sync state with the connected daw. Better state management when switching profiles/folders. V-Pot state images can be saved in sprite files, and full images are supported (in addition to the LED state images where only the part for at led position in the lit state is present). Some bug fixes and performance enhancements.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.
published_versions.description: Control any Daw or Midi device using Control Change, Program Change, Note On/Off, Sysex, Mackie Control and Midi Show Control messages.
published_versions.release_notes:
Fader buttons can display a new set of "mixer-like" faders as well as custom fader images. Fader buttons can be "linked" so that one button shows the lower half of the fader and the other the upper half. Channel buttons can be assigned to the selected track in addition to tracks 1-8.

Channel buttons can display track names. Transport buttons changed to better sync state with the connected daw. Better state management when switching profiles/folders. V-Pot state images can be saved in sprite files, and full images are supported (in addition to the LED state images where only the part for at led position in the lit state is present). Some bug fixes and performance enhancements.

published_versions.subtitle: Control any Daw or Midi device through MIDI commands.

published_versions.release_notes:
The Note On/Off action can have real articulation names for selection in the Key dropdown.
The Note On/Off action can have a specified Note Off velocity.
The Program Change and Control Change actions can have customized dropdown contents for programs and commands.
The Mackie Control action can show db value for faders in selected DAWs.

published_versions.subtitle: Lumia companion app that connect Lumia Stream to your Stream Deck.
published_versions.description: Control Lumia Stream from your Stream Deck with pre-made shortcuts ready to use. With the powerful tools that Lumia Stream offers, streamers can change the colors of their lights, send Midi and OSC commands, Text-To-Speech, as well as set up custom animations, patterns, and scenes based on viewer engagement and actions. With a wide array of colors to choose from, our goal is to close the gap between content creators and their community
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Fixed the disconnect issue

✦ Added new Stream Deck buttons that can control our 6.2 Overlays

✦ Turn an Overlay or Layer on/off

✦ Set the Overlay content with a button

✦ Trigger your Overlay media assets

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck.
published_versions.description: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck. Features include: Manage Giveaways, Clip-To-Chat, Send chat messages, Ban users, Update stream title and tags, Twitch Pager (Flashes stream deck on follows/subs/bits/channel points, or !page command), Channel Monitor (Shows which of your favorite streamers are now live)
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Migrated to new Twitch Viewers endpoint

✦ Added initial support for Stream Deck Plus

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck.
published_versions.description: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck. Features include: Manage Giveaways, Clip-To-Chat, Send chat messages, Ban users, Update stream title and tags, Twitch Pager (Flashes stream deck on follows/subs/bits/channel points, or !page command), Channel Monitor (Shows which of your favorite streamers are now live)
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Mod/Vip action allows you to add/remove VIPs and Moderators

✦ Ban/Timeout action allows you to Ban/Unban and Timeout/UnTimeout users

✦ Clear Chat action lets you clear all messages in the chat

✦ Shield Mode action lets you toggle Twitch's Shield Mode as well as see the current status on the key

✦ Message action now lets you to send an announcement to the chat

✦ Create Marker action now supports a custom marker description

✦ Removed the host option in Live Streamers (since Twitch disabled it). Long pressing a person in Live Streamers action will now start a Raid

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck.
published_versions.description: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck. Features include: Manage Giveaways, Clip-To-Chat, Send chat messages, Ban users, Update stream title and tags, Twitch Pager (Flashes stream deck on follows/subs/bits/channel points, or !page command), Channel Monitor (Shows which of your favorite streamers are now live)
published_versions.release_notes:
`Chat Pager` can now show the username of the user paging

By default `Chat Pager` will now auto stop the alert after 5 seconds of flashing (but can be customized)

`Clip To Chat` now supports a customized chat message

`Live Streamers` now supports choosing a Stream Preview/Game Icon/Username Avatar on the images

`Live Streamers` now allows to filter out users

Multiple bug fixes

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck.
published_versions.description: Advanced tools to control Twitch from your Stream Deck. Features include: Manage Giveaways, Clip-To-Chat, Send chat messages, Ban users, Update stream title and tags, Twitch Pager (Flashes stream deck on follows/subs/bits/channel points, or !page command), Channel Monitor (Shows which of your favorite streamers are now live)
published_versions.release_notes:
Ban/Timeout action to quickly ban/timeout/untimeout users directly from the Stream Deck

Create Stream Marker now allows creating markers on others' channels (As long as they set you as an Editor)

The Change Stream Title/Game/Tags action no longer requires files to set the settings

Both Send Message and ShoutOut now show the max length of a message field.

Migrated all the code to use Twitch's new APIs

published_versions.subtitle: Stopwatch implementation with various display and behaviour settings.
published_versions.description: Stopwatch that you can also display on your stream.
published_versions.release_notes:
Our faithful Stopwatch plugin coming back with a much needed overhaul:
- Visual indication if the stopwatch is running or stopped
- User-Customizable images for Enabled/Paused states
- New Shared Id feature allows you to view and control the same stopwatch from different profiles and keys
- Multi-Action support (works great with the use of Shared Ids)
- Backend logic improved to keep much more accurate time keeping when running for very long periods of times

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced set of useful plugins for controlling Windows.
published_versions.description: Control Windows from the Stream Deck. Control the volume of apps or devices, Toggle Bluetooth/Wifi on or off, use the 'Explorer Scratch Pad' to quickly cycle between common folders, 'Multi-Clip' turns every key to an individual clipboard, Ping servers and see latency, change power plans, Stop/Start/Restart Windows services, Virtual Desktop support, and more
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added Virtual Desktop support for the new Windows 11 (22H2) version

✦ Drive Info action now has an Invert Progress Bar setting, if you prefer seeing "amount used" vs "amount free"

published_versions.subtitle: Advanced set of useful plugins for controlling Windows.
published_versions.description: Control Windows from the Stream Deck. Control the volume of apps or devices, Toggle Bluetooth/Wifi on or off, use the 'Explorer Scratch Pad' to quickly cycle between common folders, 'Multi-Clip' turns every key to an individual clipboard, Ping servers and see latency, change power plans, Stop/Start/Restart Windows services, Virtual Desktop support, and more
published_versions.release_notes:
**Audio/Volume:**

✦ You can now use `App Volume Adjuster` and `App Volume Set` to control the volume of the **CURRENT ACTIVE WINDOW**.

✦ Control your Windows System volume (not just specific apps) with the   `Audio Device Volume`  actions.

Pro-Tip: Also supports tweaking your Microphone levels.

✦ `App Mute Toggle` action allows you to mute/unmute a specific app, including the **CURRENT ACTIVE WINDOW**

✦ `Audio Device/Mic Mute Toggle` lets you mute/unmute any device (including mics)

✦ `App Audio Mixer` now supports filtering out apps you don't want shown

✦ `Default Audio Device` now supports setting the **Default Communication Device**

**Notifications**

✦ `Notification Popup` action lets you create custom Windows notifications from the Stream Deck

**Misc**

✦ `Keyboard Caps/Num/Scroll Toggle` allows you to control the Caps/Num/Scroll lock keys and see their status

✦ `Service Start\Stop` no longer requires Stream Deck to run as Admin!
    ✦ Also, now shows you the status of the service (Running/Stopped)

**Networking**

✦ `Bluetooth/Wifi Toggle` from the stream deck

✦ `IP Info` action to see your Internet IP

✦ `Network Card Info` now changes color to red if the network is disconnected

**Virtual Desktop**

✦ `Virtual Desktop 

✦ Show` action displays the name of the current VD.

✦ `Switch Virtual Desktop` will now change color to green if you're already in that VD

published_versions.subtitle: Converts a Stream Deck key into a screen magnifier, with up to 32x zoom.
published_versions.description:
Converts a Stream Deck key into a screen magnifier, with up to 32x zoom.
Includes an option to move the mouse pixel by pixel for better precision.

published_versions.subtitle: Converts a Stream Deck key into a screen magnifier, with up to 32x zoom.
published_versions.description:
Converts a Stream Deck key into a screen magnifier, with up to 32x zoom.
Includes an option to move the mouse pixel by pixel for better precision.

published_versions.subtitle: Control your webcam from the Stream Deck.
published_versions.description:
Control your webcam from the Stream Deck. Supports Zoom, Focus, Brightness, Contrast, White Balance, Exposure and more.
Note: Specific features depend on your webcam's driver. If a specific setting is not available the plugin will indicate it.
published_versions.release_notes:
Plugin recognizes multiple webcams of the same type and lets you control each individually.

Added new property: PowerLine Frequency (Anti Flicker)

Added new property: Low Light Compensation

published_versions.subtitle: Control your webcam from the Stream Deck.
published_versions.description:
Control your webcam from the Stream Deck. Supports Zoom, Focus, Brightness, Contrast, White Balance, Exposure and more.
Note: Specific features depend on your webcam's driver. If a specific setting is not available the plugin will indicate it.
published_versions.release_notes:
What's new:
- Webcam PTT action sets a value when the key is pressed and returns to previous value when released. 
- Fade Length setting in Webcam Set and Webcam PTT allows you to gradually transition to the value.
- Title Prefix setting allows you to add text before the value that is displayed on the key.

published_versions.subtitle: Control your webcam from the Stream Deck.
published_versions.description:
Control your webcam from the Stream Deck. Supports Zoom, Focus, Brightness, Contrast, White Balance, Exposure and more.
Note: Specific features depend on your webcam's driver. If a specific setting is not available the plugin will indicate it.

published_versions.description: Simple interface to retrieve information from KeePass database. Unofficial.
published_versions.release_notes:
Added the option to activate or deactivate the permutation of the characters in the password generation

Added the option to retrieve a KeePass entry by its UUID

New action: Aware which allows users to retrieve a KeePass entry based on the active window

New action: MircoBabin's KeePassCommander which allows direct communication with KeePass using MircoBabin's KeePassCommander

New option added in all the actions, Clear Time

It will clear the clipboard after the specified time in seconds.

It will not clear the clipboard if it is set to 0, the default value.

Bug Fixes

published_versions.subtitle: The Best Real Time Voice Changer for Online Games & Video Streaming.
published_versions.description:
Take your streams to the next level with Voicemod x Elgato Stream Deck! With Voicemod’s real-time voice changer and soundboard, you can engage your audience like never before with epic voice filters and sound clips at the touch of a button.

Experience the ultimate fusion of creativity and audio control with the dynamic duo, Elgato's Stream Deck and Voicemod. Stream Deck, available in models like the compact Stream Deck Mini (6 keys), the versatile Stream Deck (15 keys), and the extensive Stream Deck XL (32 keys), along with Stream Deck Mobile (15 virtual buttons) for your iPhone and iPad, offers unmatched live content creation controllers. Instantly control your stream, launch files, interact with your audience, and much more, all at your fingertips!
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Select Skin or Tune in Voices. Now you can change not only your voice but the skins in it! Try it with Trauma Medic.

✦ Fixed a behavior that would open the browser tab x times when the multi-action key was pressed and you had Voicemod uninstalled.

✦ Fixed minor performance bugs.

published_versions.subtitle: Control your Philips Hue lights.
published_versions.description:
Control your Philips Hue lights in your network.

Since version 1.6 it also supports Stream Deck +
published_versions.release_notes:
Changes since version 1.5:
- allow adding a bridge's ip manually
- support Stream Deck+:

Turn a dial:
- to change the brightness/temperature

Press a dial to:
- set the brightness/temperature to the configured value (if the light is on) 
- if the light is off,  turn the light on

Long-Press the dial:
- toggle the light on/off

Tap the touch-panel:
- toggle the light on/off

localizations.value: 控制您的 Philips Hue 灯。
Contrôlez vos systèmes d’éclairage Philips Hue.
Philips Hueの照明をコントロールします。

published_versions.subtitle: With the ultimate Moments SlideShow plugin, holiday memories slide right over the Stream Deck buttons.
published_versions.description: With the ultimate Moments SlideShow plugin, holiday memories slide right over the Stream Deck buttons. Turn the Stream Deck into a mesmerizing living slideshow with vacation snaps from the beach, photo collections from the last road trip, impressions from past sightseeing tours, memories from the last party event with friends and family, and much more. With the valuable photo plugin you always keep an eye on your precious moments. All photos are cropped perfectly to the format of the button and optimized for crystal clear images (the original images are not changed). Supported indexed file formats: jpg,tif,png,webp,bmp

published_versions.subtitle: Control YouTube.
published_versions.description: Control YouTube.
published_versions.release_notes:
This update adds three new Actions ✦ Play Ad: Inserts an ad into the live stream. If eligible, ads are triggered to serve within seconds. It is not guaranteed that all viewers will get an ad. These viewers will continue to watch your live stream. ✦ Open Dashboard: Opens the YouTube dashboard for the selected live stream in your default browser. ✦ Start/Stop Stream: Start or stop the selected live stream.

Scheduled stream support ✦ Chat message, viewer, and other actions can be configured for a specific scheduled stream or the current active stream.

Bug fixes & performance improvements ✦ Added redesigned icons. ✦ Resolved a bug where the viewer action and message would stop working intermittently.

published_versions.subtitle: Control YouTube.

published_versions.release_notes:

These viewers will continue to watch your live stream. ✦ Open Dashboard: Opens the YouTube dashboard for the selected live stream in your default browser. ✦ Start/Stop Stream: Start or stop the selected live stream.

Scheduled stream support ✦ Chat message, viewer, and other actions can be configured for a specific scheduled stream or the current active stream.

Bug fixes & performance improvements ✦ Added redesigned icons. ✦ Resolved a bug where the viewer action and message would stop working intermittently.

published_versions.subtitle: Control Twitch.
published_versions.description:
Ready to impress your viewers? With the Twitch plugin, control your broadcasts directly from Stream Deck. No more managing dashboards and chat commands. Now, run your stream with a key press — without ever losing focus.

Key actions include:
Message: Send a preset message or command in chat
Clear Chat: Clear the chat history
Emote Only: Toggle emote-only chat
Follower Only: Toggle follower-only chat
Sub Only: Toggle subscriber-only chat
Slow Mode: Toggle slow mode chat
Ad Break: Run an advertisement for a preset length
Stream Info: Edit your stream title and category
Marker: Add a stream marker to highlight key moments
Viewer Count: Display the number of viewers watching your live video
Create Clip: Create a clip of the previous 90 seconds
Open Clip: Open your channel's most recent clip
Shield Mode: Activate/Deactivate Shield Mode

Featuring real-time status displays. That means your key appearance changes with each press!

Feeling creative? Try adding Twitch to a multi action sequence! Multi actions combine actions from different plugins for special effects. Need an example? Run an ad break, switch OBS scenes, and play elevator music — all with a single key press.

Stream more, micromanage less. Get the official Twitch plugin for Stream Deck.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Reworked the Viewers action to show live viewers  without requiring key press.

✦ Added information about using chat commands with "/" to the Chat action.

✦ Improved connectivity with Twitch's API.

localizations.value: Twitchをコントロールします。

published_versions.subtitle: Control numerous NewTek devices

Control numerous NewTek devices, including TriCaster, using a Stream Deck. Requires TriCaster systems running on Rev 7-3 or higher software.

✦ Perform TriCaster actions with feedback on Stream Deck buttons.

✦ TriCaster audio mixer control using Stream Deck+

✦ Trigger macros on TriCaster or 3Play systems.

✦ DataLink countdown timer functions.

✦ Teleprompter playback control, can be used with the Stream Deck Pedal.

✦ Select NDI decode presets from NewTek Spark Plus converters.

✦ Recall saved positions from NewTek PTZ cameras.

✦ Enhancements to teleprompter plug-in (toggle script playback based on current state).

published_versions.subtitle: Stream Deck plugin to control Nanoleaf Tiles
published_versions.description:
Control Nanoleaf Panels, Canvas and Shapes Tiles from your Stream Deck. 
Toggle the controller tiles on or off; increase, decrease or set the brightness level; set the tiles color or apply one of the special effects. 
Use the Stream Deck 'Multi Action' to send actions to several controllers. 
Use 'Folders' to group actions per Nanoleaf controller. 
Suggestions and comments, good or bad, are always welcome.
published_versions.release_notes:
Added Brightness Increase and Brightness Decrease buttons.
Added additional localization files in English (de, en, es, fr, ja, ko and zh_CN).
Added code to update like buttons across Stream Deck hardware.
Added new icons for Brightness, Color and Effect where the multi-color icon indicates last pushed.
Changed Brightness to set a static value.
Pay attention as to how the button icons update.

- It is certain
- It is decidedly so
- Without a doubt
- Yes, definitely
- You may rely on it
- As I see it, yes
- Most likely
- Outlook good
- Yes
- Signs point to yes
- Reply hazy try again
- Ask again later
- Better not tell you now
- Cannot predict now
- Concentrate and ask again
- Don't count on it
- My reply is no
- My sources say no
- Outlook not so good
- Very doubtful

published_versions.subtitle: Outlook Instant Mail accelerates the email workflow
published_versions.description: Outlook Instant Mail accelerates the email workflow to a new level and generates a finished Outlook 365 email template with (TO, CC, BCC, Subject, HTML Body, Importance Status, Read-Receipt Requested and Attachments). The email can either be displayed before sending or sent immediately. The Attachment Option allows static attachments or the current file selection in Windows Explorer. The email signature is automatically imported (if available) from the selected Outlook profile account. With the plugin you can create countless standard templates and optimize the email process. For optimal processing, Outlook should be open.

published_versions.subtitle: Shows the selected Discord server member's online status and avatar.
published_versions.description:
Discord Member Status for Stream Deck! Stay connected with your Discord community like never before with our powerful plugin. Discord Member Status allows you to effortlessly display the online status and avatars of selected server members right on your Stream Deck buttons. Whether you're a content creator, streamer, or avid Discord user, this plugin is a must-have for enhancing your interaction with the community.

Features at a Glance:

💢 Timely Status Updates: Keep track of your Discord server members' online presence with ease. Our plugin supports four different statuses: Online, Idle, Do Not Disturb, and Offline. Stay informed about who's available to chat and collaborate.

💢 Automatic Avatar Population: Our plugin takes care of the avatar display for you. When a selected user is online, the plugin will automatically fetch their avatar and display it on the Stream Deck button. Say goodbye to the manual effort of searching for avatars, saving time for what truly matters—building connections.

💢 Instant Discord Widget Access: Need to quickly jump into the server and see who is online? Simply press the designated button on your Stream Deck, and Discord Member Status will bring up the Discord server widget right before your eyes. No more hassle of navigating through multiple windows or applications.

💢 Independent of Discord Application: No need to keep the Discord application open to utilize the power of Discord Member Status. Our plugin works seamlessly in the background, ensuring you never miss an important status update, even when Discord isn't active. Stay connected while focusing on your content creation or other tasks.

Enhance your Discord experience and engage with your server members effortlessly. Discord Member Status for Stream Deck is here to revolutionize the way you connect, collaborate, and create. Get ready to take your interaction with Discord to new heights!

Download Discord Member Status today and unlock a whole new level of Discord integration on your Stream Deck. Join the ranks of satisfied users who have made their Discord communities even more vibrant and engaging. Let the power of Stream Deck and Discord Member Status work in harmony for you!

published_versions.subtitle: Shows number of members active on Discord.
published_versions.description:
Discord Member Count: The Ultimate Stream Deck Plugin

Display the real-time member count of your Discord server or track the number of members in voice channels effortlessly with Discord Member Count, the must-have plugin for streamers and Discord server owners.

Features:
💢 Online Member Count: Stay up to date with the number of members currently online on your Discord server. Whether you're streaming, moderating, or simply curious, this feature keeps you in the loop, providing valuable insights at a glance.
💢 Voice Channel Member Count: Monitor the number of members present in voice channels on your Discord server. Perfect for gaming sessions, podcast recordings, or any voice communication events where the active participation of your community matters.

Simple Configuration:
💢 Choose Your Display Option: Select whether you want to showcase the overall online member count or the member count in voice channels. Customize the plugin to suit your needs and preference effortlessly.
💢 Discord Server Widget at Your Fingertips: Pressing the button reveals your Discord server widget, allowing you to view essential server details, including channels, members, and more. Keep an eye on your server's health and activity with just a single click.
💢 Seamless Integration: Discord Member Count works independently of the Discord application. No need to keep it open or switch windows. Stay focused on your content while effortlessly monitoring your Discord community.
💢 Discord Server Widget JSON API URL: To get started, provide your Discord Server Widget JSON API URL during the setup process. It's quick and easy, enabling the plugin to access the necessary data and provide you with accurate member count information.

Stay connected, stay informed, and engage with your Discord community like never before. Get Discord Member Count for your Stream Deck today!

Note: This plugin requires an active internet connection and the Discord Server Widget JSON API URL to function correctly.
published_versions.release_notes:
💢 Refresh limited to a maximum of every thirty seconds.
💢 Default value for the refresh rate variable set in code to 30 seconds.
💢 Title configuration disabled, since it is used by the plugin to display the number of members in a server.

published_versions.description:
Customization is at the heart of Days Until __. You have full control over the appearance of your countdown display.

💢 Customize the event text to provide a clear description of the event you're counting down to.
💢 Choose from a wide range of colors to match your personal preference or the theme of your workspace.
💢 Make your countdown truly stand out with the ability to add a Day of Event overlay image that will be displayed when the countdown reaches zero.
💢 But that's not all! Days Until __ goes the extra mile by allowing you to assign a custom image that will be shown throughout the countdown. Whether it's a personal photo, a logo, or an image that represents the event, you have the freedom to personalize your countdown display and make it truly unique.

Download Days Until __ today and discover the convenience and flexibility of having countdowns right at your fingertips. Stay on top of your schedule, never miss an important event, and add a touch of personalization to your countdowns with Days Until __ for Stream Deck!

published_versions.subtitle: Introducing Game Action Timer - Your Ultimate Cooldown Management Plugin for Stream Deck!
published_versions.description:
Introducing Game Action Timer - Your Ultimate Cooldown Management Plugin for Stream Deck!

Never miss a crucial moment in your games again with Game Action Timer, the innovative Stream Deck plugin designed to enhance your gaming experience. Take control of your cooldowns like never before with these powerful features:

⏱️ Cooldown Timer with Keyboard Macro Trigger: Set up your cooldown timers effortlessly using the GameActionTimer.exe in your custom keyboard macros. Experience precision timing for your game actions with ease.

🔘 Real-time Stream Deck Button Updates: Stay informed at all times with the Stream Deck Button displaying the current cooldown time for your triggered action. No more guesswork - you'll know exactly when your skills are ready to be unleashed!

🎨 Customizable Button Images: Personalize your Stream Deck Buttons with images representing the action's readiness status. Easily distinguish between actions that are ready for use and those still on cooldown. And if you prefer, add an optional "Not Ready" image to further level up your setup.

🎮 Create and Customize to Your Heart's Content: With Game Action Timer, you have the freedom to create as many Stream Deck Buttons as you desire. Tailor each one to suit your specific game actions and cooldown requirements. The power is in your hands!

🔊 Audio Alerts for Perfect Timing: When the cooldown ends, Game Action Timer ensures you're promptly notified with an audio alert. Say goodbye to missed opportunities and hello to precise execution!

Streamline your gameplay, optimize your cooldown management, and gain the competitive edge you deserve with Game Action Timer. Download now and elevate your gaming prowess to new heights!

Note: Game Action Timer is compatible with various games and supports popular keyboards. Check the documentation for a list of supported games and hardware.

Get ready to dominate the battlefield with unparalleled timing precision. Download Game Action Timer and elevate your gaming experience today!

*Stream Deck Labs GameActionTimer Application is REQUIRED (free) & must be installed separately.* Go to: https://www.krabs.me/streamdeck-plugins/game-action-timer to download the application.

Example usage in a keyboard macro: %APPDATA%\StreamDeckLabs\GameActionTimer\GameActionTimer.exe "" ""

Create as many Stream Deck Button as you like.

published_versions.subtitle: Allows switching focus to specific process' main window.
published_versions.description:
Plugin allows one-key switching to a given application's main window. 
Simply enter application's executable name (eg. devenv.exe for Visual Studio, spotify.exe for Spotify etc.), press the button and the application will be brought to the front. If there are multiple matching processes running, the plugin will cycle through them. If no process matches, you may optionally specify a path to the application, which should be executed.

✦ Roshan no longer drops cheese on third death. Now drops cheese on second death

published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Introducing a New 'Pause/Resume Match' action!

  ✦ You can now pause/resume your Dota 2 matches! (Game State Integration)

✦ Introducing a New 'Display Clock Time' visualizer!

  ✦ You can now have a visual on your Stream Deck that shows your the clock time of a running Dota 2 match.

✦ Fixed a critical error with plugin installation

published_versions.subtitle: Dota 2 tools for Stream Deck.
published_versions.description:
A suite of open source Stream Deck plugins created for Valve's MOBA: Dota 2

To utilize the rune camera preview actions you'll have to add the following commands to your Dota 2 launch options:

✦ -gamestateintegration +exec stream_deck_plugins_dota_2.cfg

✦ For more information on these launch commands, please visit the support page below.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added a new action that closes the 'Dota 2' application on button press. I thought I'd add this in, since you can't easily alt+f4 out of the game client. Perfect for closing the client for a faster re-launch or even, good old rage quitting ;D

✦ Fixed a couple bugs related to our Roshan timer, previously if you closed the StreamDeck software and re-launched/changed pages there was some finicky behavior where multiple timers were running and overriding/'t-clipping' each other. This was because we weren't disposing of the timers appropriately. A side affect of this was that actions needed to be visible to progress the timer along.


✦ Re-implemented the ability to have the Roshan timer run in the background.
The action now caches the last visible time and uses that to calculate how much time has passed since viewing the action which brings us back that previous functionality.

published_versions.subtitle: Create your own full or partial screen clock using modular pieces.
published_versions.description:
Clockworks, the ultimate Clock plugin for Stream Deck that empowers you to build, design, and customize a captivating digital clock experience across multiple buttons. With Clockworks, your Stream Deck becomes a symphony of time, seamlessly integrating clock functionality into your streaming, productivity, or gaming setup.

Clockworks offers an intuitive and user-friendly interface, allowing you to easily configure and arrange your digital clock across various buttons on your Stream Deck. Effortlessly create a visually stunning time display that complements your personal style and enhances your workspace.

With Clockworks' extensive customization options, you have complete control over every visual aspect of your digital clock. Adjust the size, color, and font of the clock digits to ensure they perfectly match your Stream Deck's button layout and aesthetic.

💢 Hour Formats: Choose between 12-hour and 24-hour formats for displaying the hours on your clock.
💢 Flexible Digit Displays: Customize the appearance of hours, minutes, and seconds with options for both one and two-digit displays. This allows for seamless integration with different clock styles and designs.
💢 Versatile Month Formats: Display the month in your preferred format, including abbreviated month names (e.g., Jan, Feb) and month numbers (e.g., 01, 02).
💢 Day of the Month and Week: Show the day of the month in a two-digit format (e.g., 01, 02) and the day of the week using abbreviated names (e.g., Mon, Tue).
💢 Various Year Formats: Select from different year formats, including the first two digits, the second two digits, or the full four-digit representation.
💢 Multiple Separators: Customize the separator between different time units with a choice of symbols such as colons (:), dashes (-), periods (.), or slashes (/). Additionally, you can adjust the size of separators to match your preferred aesthetic.
💢 Extensive Font Selection: Personalize your digital clock by choosing from a wide range of fonts. Find the perfect style that complements your Stream Deck setup and overall theme.
💢 Blank Button Support: Incorporate a blank button within your clock design to add visual balance and flexibility. You can customize its background color and even add an image to further enhance its appearance.
💢 Automatic Local Time: Clockworks seamlessly utilizes your local time, ensuring your digital clock always reflects the correct time based on your location. You can rely on accurate timekeeping without any manual adjustments.

With Clockworks, your Stream Deck transforms into a masterpiece of timekeeping and design. Embrace the power to build, design, and customize your digital clock across multiple buttons with Clockworks' versatility, aesthetic appeal, and intuitive functionality. Unlock a new dimension of visual elegance and productivity with Clockworks—where time becomes art.
published_versions.release_notes:
💢 Fixed CSS issues caused by Stream Deck SDK Update.
💢 Updated Previews, Plugin Icon, & Description.

published_versions.subtitle: Create your own full or partial screen clock using modular pieces.
published_versions.description:
Clockworks. Create your own full or partial screen clock using modular pieces. ‎ ✦ 12 & 24 hour formats for Hour display.
✦ One and two digit displays for hours, minutes, and seconds.
✦ Multiple Month formats (Abbreviated month name & month #).
✦ Day of the month (2 digit) & Day of the week (Abbreviated name).
✦ Multiple Year formats (1st two digits, 2nd two digits, & 4 digit).
✦ Multiple separators ( : - . / ) in multiple sizes.
✦ Many fonts to choose from.
✦ Blank button with background color and image support.
💢 Uses your local time automatically.

✦ Fixed bug that caused 2nd digit of Large 24 hour clock Hour to display incorrectly under certain circumstances.

✦ For 24 hour clocks, midnight will now show as 00 instead of 24.

published_versions.subtitle: A dynamic volume mixer.
published_versions.description:
A dynamic volume mixer with process icons that reflects the windows 
volume mixer. Control each independent process' volume as applications 
open and close. No need to statically assign a button to a single 
application, the application placeholder actions will update 
accordingly.

IMPORTANT: To have the plugin work best and provide as many process 
icons as possible, please ensure you are running your Stream Deck app as 
an administrator. Some apps may show a default icon if not running as 
administrator.

Features:
Inline Controls
Have a small stream deck? Instead of dedicating buttons to volume 
controls, only show controls when you select an application you want to 
control.

Static Applications
Want an application to stay on the same key regardless if it's open or 
not? Make it static.

Application Blacklisting
Have an application you know you will never want to control? Add it to 
your blacklist to prevent it from being displayed on your Stream Deck.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added volume step to volume key.

✦ Added ability to hold volume keys.

✦ Added error reporting to find bugs and improve experience.

✦ Added settings list filtering. (i.e Blacklisted apps wont show in the static app list)

✦ Fixed static volume key volume label not showing.

✦ Fixed a volume change from updating inline control keys.

✦ Fixed changing default output device causes app to crash.

✦ Fixed issue with removing blacklisted app that are not open.

✦ Fixed issue with static volume keys not respecting volume step.

✦ Fixed issue with applications remaining selected when the session is lost.

✦ Fixed process with multiple audio sessions not have the same volume on initialization.

✦ Fixed issues with incompatible setting selections (i.e The same blacklisted and static app)

✦ Fixed issue with static app list not showing the current value.

published_versions.subtitle: Shows the status of the azure pipeline
published_versions.description:
Azure Pipeline for Streamdeck lets the user observe their Azure DevOps Pipeline. The Icon will change when the pipeline runs, fails, or succeeds. You can also click on the Key to get straight to the pipeline.

In order to use it, you need to provide: Company, Project, AccessToken (with at least build(Read); Release (Read)), Pipeline ID (get it from the URL of your pipeline), Run Index - Index of the nth run. For the current run, choose 0.

published_versions.description: Take control of your Govee lights with the push of a button!
published_versions.release_notes:
New action, "On / Off", controls the state of a light.

New action, "Brightness", controls the brightness of a light, from 0 to 100%.

New action, "Color", sets the color of a light.

New action, "Color Temperature", sets the temperature of a light, i.e. warm or cool.

published_versions.subtitle: Add your favorite Twitch streamers!
published_versions.description: No login or account access required! Add your favorite Twitch streamers. When live, the button will show their live view thumbnail preview (updates every few minutes). When offline, the button will show their Twitch profile image greyed out. Pressing the button will take you to their Twitch page.

published_versions.subtitle: CONTROL WINDOWS WITH ONE DEVICE.
published_versions.description:
CONTROL YOUR WINDOWS WITH ONE DEVICE Collection of Windows Assistants, Tools, On-the-fly Wizards inspired by Microsoft PowerToys to optimize your Workflow. The Windows Cockpit Plugin is the ultimate Wingman for your Stream Deck.

With the Windows Control Stream Deck Plugin you control all important events, shortcuts and workflows. With the pre-configured Assistants (Wizard-Tools), you bring your Workflow to a New Level.

Assistants excerpt Overview:

  • Image-Batch Format Convert (jpg, tif, png, bmp, webp)
  • Image-Batch Resize/Rotate/Flip/Brightness/Contrast (jpg, tif, png, bmp, webp)
  • File-List (UNC) of current Selection into Clipboard
  • E-Mail Instant Template
  • Instant Google Search
  • Instant Google Translating
  • Window Position Control (Minimize, Maximize -All, Force Top-Most etc.)
  • Text Modifications (Regex, UpperCase, lowerCase, MirrowCase, DateTime Timestamp)
  • Shortcut Generator
  • GodMode
  • Stream Deck Interface
  • File Move, Copy, Delete, Backup -Events (smart Filemanager)
  • Screenshot Events
  • Audio Control and Recorder
  • Windows Apps (Sticky Notes, ToDo, Bing Weather, etc.)
  • Zip and Extract Files
  • Merge and Split PDF Files
  • Emulate Mouse Events (Left, Right, Wheel, Position)
  • Start/Kill Process
  • System Restart/Shutdown Events
  • Admin PowerShell and Command Line
  • Airplane and Dark/Light Theme Toggle
  • Taskmanager, Emojis, HDR, Recycle Bin, RAW-Print, Spotlight and many more...

Complete Assistants Overview: Stream Deck Interface, Shutdown, Shutdown -Force, Reset, Reset -Force, Reset GPU Driver, Lock Windows, Sleep, Sign Out, Desktop Icons, GodMode, HDR on/off, Airplane Mode published_versions.subtitle: Windows Gizmos is a collection of tools for Windows 10+.
published_versions.description:
Introducing the "Windows Gizmos" Stream Deck Plugin for Windows 10+ - your ultimate productivity companion. This powerful plugin enhances your Stream Deck experience by providing a range of quality-of-life tools specifically designed for the Windows 10+ operating systems. Whether you're a content creator, a streamer, or simply a Windows enthusiast, this plugin will revolutionize the way you interact with your computer, streamlining your workflow and boosting your efficiency.

Actions Included:
🔅 HDR Toggle
🔅 Show / Hide Desktop Icons
🔅 Change a Window's Display Mode by Window Title or Name (Min, Max, Normal, Hide, Show, Force)
🔅 Focus Window by Process Name (Bring to Front. Window must be unminimized for this to work.)
🔅 Show Active Window Titles and Process Names
🔅 Sleep Monitors (Sleeps All Monitors. Awaken with mouse movement, mouse click or keyboard press)
🔅 Run As Administrator
🔅 Review your Computer's Reliability and Problem History
🔅 Custom Toast Notification
🔅 Clear All Notifications
🔅 Toggle Notifications On/Off (Win 11)
🔅 Activate Windows Speech Recognition Dictation and Voice Commands
🔅 Empty Recycle Bin
🔅 Magnifier Zoom In, Zoom Out, and Exit
🔅 Move Application To The Monitor On - Left / Right
🔅 Minimize All Application Except The Active Application - Toggle
🔅 Open Task Manager
🔅 Open Clipboard Bin / History
🔅 Toggle Desktop
🔅 Shutdown, Cancel Shutdown, Reboot, Sleep, Lock, Sign Out
🔅 Reboot to BIOS
🔅 Close or Kill an Application
🔅 On-Screen Keyboard Toggle
🔅 Rotate Display Let, Right, Up, Down (If supported by your monitor)
🔅 Virtual Desktop - Close current Virtual Desktop, Virtual Desktop - Next Right, Virtual Desktop - Next Left
🔅 Screenshot - Capture part of the screen with Snip & Sketch
🔅 Screenshot - Capture the full screen and automatically save to Screenshots folder
🔅 Open Emoji Panel

Elevate your productivity and efficiency with Windows Gizmos. Take control of your digital workspace like never before and experience the ultimate convenience at your fingertips. Streamline your workflow, automate tasks, and maximize your potential with this essential plugin.
Upgrade your Stream Deck experience today!
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added: Reboot to BIOS

✦ Added: Toggle Notifications On/Off (Win 11)

✦ Status of HDR Toggle and Toggle Notifications On/Off will update when button appears on the page.

✦ BUG FIX: Show / Hide Desktop Icons should now work on all Windows 10+ systems. Fixed an issue where it would fail to work on a small number of Windows installations.

published_versions.subtitle: Discord Messenger allows you to send messages to your Discord Server.
published_versions.description:
Discord Messenger: The Ultimate Stream Deck Plugin for Discord Embed Templates Communicating with your Discord community has never been easier! Introducing Discord Messenger, the revolutionary Stream Deck plugin that empowers you to send highly customizable formatted messages to your Discord Server with just a click. Unlock a new level of interaction and engagement with your audience through a variety of versatile templates tailored to your needs.

📨 Simple Message Template: Send straightforward messages to your Discord Server with ease. Customize the content, add emojis, and express yourself effortlessly.

📣 Custom Embed Message Template: Make a lasting impression with beautifully crafted embed messages. Bring your announcements to life by personalizing every detail, including titles, descriptions, colors, and more.

🎥 Twitch Now Streaming Template: Keep your community informed when you go live on Twitch. Automatically share vital information such as your Twitch channel name and current stream topic/game.

📹 YouTube Video Template: Share your latest YouTube videos directly to Discord. With automated video information and customizable descriptions, you can entice your community to click and watch effortlessly.

🐦 Twitter Post Template: Keep your Discord community up to date with your latest tweets. Share Twitter posts seamlessly, complete with usernames, post URLs, and captivating descriptions.

But that's not all! Discord Messenger offers unparalleled customization options to truly make each message your own:

✏️ Personalize Your Identity: Display your name, avatar, and message to add a personal touch to every interaction. Let your community know it's you.

🔊 Text to Speech: Enable or disable the option for your messages to be read aloud using text-to-speech technology. Ensure everyone can hear your announcements loud and clear.

🖌️ Tailor Your Embeds: Fine-tune the appearance of your embed messages to match your brand. Customize the author information, icons, links, colors, and more. Create visually stunning announcements.

📸 Eye-Catching Images: Make your messages pop with vibrant visuals. Utilize main images, thumbnails, footer icons, and more to captivate your audience and leave a lasting impression.

📚 Templates Galore: Whether you're a content creator, streamer, or community manager, our collection of templates covers all your communication needs. From simple messages to rich embeds, we have you covered.

⚠ Note: This plugin requires an active internet connection and the Discord Server Widget JSON API URL to function correctly.
published_versions.release_notes:
💢 Now allows to ping @everyone.

💢 PI changes and clean up.

💢 New preview images and new icons.

localizations.value: Mit Discord Bote können Sie hochgradig anpassbare formatierte Nachrichten an Ihren Discord-Server senden. Die Anpassungseinstellungen hängen von der verwendeten Vorlage ab: Name des Beitragenden Benutzers, Avatar-URL für den Beitragenden Benutzer, Nachricht vom Beitragenden Benutzer, Aktivieren/Deaktivieren von Text-to-Speech, Einbetten von Autoreninformationen, Autorensymbol-Bild-URL, Autornamenslink, Farbe der eingebetteten Beitragsseitenleiste, Eingebettete Beitrags-Thumbnail-URL, Eingebetteter Beitragstitel, Eingebetteter Beitragstitel-Link, Eingebettete Beitragstitelbeschreibung, Eingebettetes Beitragsfeld Nr. 1 – Überschrift, Eingebetteter Beitragsfeld Nr. 1 Text, Eingebettetes Beitragsfeld Nr. 1 – Überschrift, Eingebetteter Beitragsfeld Nr. 1 Text, Option für Inline ein/aus, Hauptbild-URL, eingebettete Fußzeilensymbol-URL, eingebetteter Fußzeilentext, Twitch-Kanalname, Streamthema/Spiel, Twitter-Benutzername, URL von Twitter-Post, YouTube-Video-URL, YouTube-Kanalname und Videobeschreibung. published_versions.subtitle: Take control of Discord voice chat.
published_versions.description: Introducing Discord 2.0 - With this update, we've turned on the nitro for new and existing actions. Tap a key to play sounds from any joined servers' soundboard, display notifications and clear them and see at a glance server stats including new message, online users and active chatters. Dial in levels with the new user volume control action, fine tune your own audio inputs and outputs, and much more.
published_versions.release_notes:
New Actions:
Soundboard Integration
✦ Trigger your favorite Discord soundboard sounds through with the tap of a key
Select audio device
✦ Switch your microphone and/or speakers with the tap of a key
Display server stats
✦ Count recent messages, online users, and active chatters
Toggle voice input mode
✦ Toggle between the two audio input choices, Push to Talk and Voice Activity
Notifications
✦ Display a count of all new notifications you receive, and display the icons of users sending you all of these pings
User volume control
✦ Alter the volume of other users in discord calls with the tap of a key or twist of a dial
Self volume control
✦ Control the volume of your microphone or speakers with the tap of a key or twist of a dial

Updated Actions:
Voice Channel
✦ You can now display the active users in the call on the icon of this action while you are in the channel

published_versions.subtitle: Take control of your audio! With an array of actions, SoundDeck lets you quickly...
published_versions.description: A powerful audio-focused plugin that allows you to capture, record, playback, and sample audio. Sound Deck also includes actions that let you control your audio devices and the audio of applications, e.g. set the default audio device, change the audio volume, or control the media playback of an application.
published_versions.release_notes:
New action, "App Media Controls", control playback of a specific applications, i.e. Chrome, Spotify, VLC etc.

New action, "Set App Volume", sets the volume of an individual application.

New action, "Set Default Audio Device".

New action, "Set Audio Device Volume".

"Set App Audio Device" action now supports input devices.

Added option to select default audio device for recording actions.

Added "Play / Overlap" option to playback actions.

Added playback volume control to "Sampler" action.

Fixed an error that would cause playback to stop when switching profiles.

published_versions.subtitle: Take control of your audio! With an array of actions, SoundDeck lets you quickly...
published_versions.description: Take control of your audio! Quickly change the audio device of applications, create samples, clip or record audio from any device, play audio files (with advanced playlists), and more.
published_versions.release_notes: Fixed an error that could be encountered during initial setup of "Clip Audio" actions.

published_versions.subtitle: Take control of your audio! With an array of actions, SoundDeck lets you quickly...
published_versions.description: Take control of your audio! Quickly change the audio device of applications, create samples, clip or record audio from any device, play audio files (with advanced playlists), and more.
published_versions.release_notes:
- Fixed an issue that caused "Set App Audio Device" to fail on Windows 11.
- Actions now support "Default" device as an audio device option; currently supported by, "Play Audio", Sampler", and "Set App Audio Device".
- Added long-press support for "Play Audio" actions; now resets the current audio to the first item in the playlist.
- Added support for AIFF and OGG audio formats.
- Logging moved to %APPDATA%\Elgato\StreamDeck\Plugins\com.geekyeggo.sounddeck.sdPlugin\logs (#32).
- Reduced memory usage of "Clip Audio" by approx ~80%.
- Updated NAudio dependency.
- Updated to .NET Framework 4.8

published_versions.subtitle: Take control of your audio! With an array of actions, SoundDeck lets you quickly...
published_versions.description: Take control of your audio! With an array of actions, SoundDeck lets you quickly... route app audio (great for Wave:1 and Wave:3), create audio clips (think Twitch clips, but for audio), save longer recordings with start/stop, play audio files with advanced playlist support, and more!

published_versions.subtitle: With advanced audio device support; Sound Deck lets you play, record, and clip from any device!
published_versions.description:
With advanced audio device support; Sound Deck lets you play, record, and clip from any device!

- Multiple clip support, with custom Play-Action.
- Start/stop recording from any device.
- Clip-it recording... to record the last x seconds!

published_versions.description: With the Wake on LAN plugin you can wake up and start your switched off devices (Computer, Printer, NAS, Server, etc.) via Network Broadcast Message (Magic Packet). In order to be able to use WOL, the motherboard, network card and BIOS must support APM (Advanced Power Management) or Advanced Configuration and Power Interface (ACPI) the WOL standard. With the app you can save energy by only waking it up when you need it.
published_versions.release_notes: UX Optimization (Code Signing)

published_versions.subtitle: Plugin that allows a user to minimize, maximize, and close windows
published_versions.description:
Minimize, maximize, close, move, or resize windows according to a window id (i.e title, filename, class names, etc). Supported on multiple monitors and through virtual desktops. 
 Also, manage, navigate and create virtual desktops
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Restored functionality on all virtual desktop actions that were broken due to a Windows 11 update

✦ Re-factored python codebase, to generate a vastly more maintainable project

✦ Removed third party library dependencies, and replaced with direct .dll binary files, to have faster actions

published_versions.subtitle: Plugin that allows a user to minimize, maximize, and close windows
published_versions.description:
Minimize, maximize, close, move, or resize windows according to a window id (i.e title, filename, class names, etc). These actions are supported on multiple monitors and through virtual desktops. 
 In addition, navigate and create new virtual desktops, for added screen real estate.
published_versions.release_notes:
Features: 

Added Two New Actions
- Move To Next Virtual Desktop
- Move To Previous Virtual Desktop

Bugs:
- Improved stability of Move Window to New Monitor/Screen action, ensuring that it's minimized or maximized state, would not trigger the window to disappear (or become transparent) when moved

localizations.value: Use this to create your own plugin

published_versions.subtitle: Plugin that allows a user to minimize, maximize, and close windows
published_versions.description: Minimize, maximize, close, or resize windows according to a window id (i.e title, etc), and move them through virtual desktops
published_versions.release_notes:
Features:

✦ Resize Window: Allows a user to define a new size for the window, and position on the desktop

✦ Go To Virtual Desktop: Allows a user to navigate to a specific virtual desktop on a windows 10+ machine

✦ Create Virtual Desktops: Allows a user to create new virtual desktops

✦ Move Window To Virtual Desktop: Allows a user to move a window to a specific virtual desktop

✦ Move Window To New Screen/Monitor: Allows a user to move a window to a specific display/monitor



Bugs:

✦ Improved stability by preventing empty or improperly configured user inputs to crash web socket server

published_versions.subtitle: Control Camera Hub on the fly
published_versions.description:
Unleash your camera's full potential with Stream Deck. Equip with 8 actions to control Camera Hub, Elgato's next-generation camera software. 

⁣

No more juggling windows, tabs, and settings. Instead, manage Facecam and EpocCam on the fly. Dial in the zoom, change brightness, or add effects — all with a key press.

⁣

Actions include:


✦ Set Property: Apply a preset value for properties like Zoom, Contrast, and Exposure

✦ Adjust Property: Fine-tune a property value up or down by preset increments

✦ Reset Property: Reset a property value to its default setting

✦ Display Property: Show the current value of a specific property

✦ Refocus: Sharpen focus automatically on the current subject.

✦ Select Input: Switch between Elgato cameras like Facecam and EpocCam

✦ Change Background: Turn on and off a specific background effect

✦ Take Snapshot: Take a picture of your current camera preview 

⁣

This plugin comes with optional dynamic sliders. Swap icon styles and layouts to create lifelike visual faders.

⁣

Feeling adventurous? Combine multiple actions across different plugins, like Control Center or OBS. Add Camera Hub to your Multi Actions for a unique audio-visual experience.

⁣

Equip your webcam with content superpowers. Get the official Camera Hub plugin for Stream Deck.

⁣

Supported devices:

✦ Elgato Facecam

✦ Elgato Facecam Pro

✦ Elgato Cam Link 4K

✦ Elgato EpocCam

✦ Corsair Voyager
published_versions.release_notes: Initial release with support for Camera Hub 1.5 including Elgato Facecam, Facecam Pro, EpocCam, Cam Link 4K and Corsair Voyager laptop.

published_versions.subtitle: Adjust your audio on the fly
published_versions.description:
Control individual application volume on the fly. Control specific applications with Manual Detection or use Auto Detection to enter a dynamically generated profile of all applications.

Key Actions: 
✦ Auto Detection: Automatically generates a profile with your currently-running apps. Control system volume, individual apps, or mute on the fly.
✦Manual Detection: Select an application and adjust the volume in step sizes or toggle mute individual apps.
Dial Actions:
✦ Manual Detection: Select an application and rotate to fine-tune volume in step sizes & press to mute.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ fixed an issue with saving Auto Detection settings

✦ fixed the property inspector visibility inside of multi-actions

✦ minor performance improvements

entries.name: MuteDeck for Zoom, Teams, and more

published_versions.subtitle: Check and control your status on Zoom and other apps.
published_versions.description:
Take control of your meetings with MuteDeck. Check and control your status on Zoom, Teams, Webex, Google Meet, and other apps. Quickly mute or unmute, toggle your webcam, start sharing, leave the meeting, and more! You can even define custom actions.

MuteDeck runs on Windows, macOS, and detects the status of conference call software. Currently, Zoom, Google Meet, and Webex are supported (with more to come). However! If MuteDeck does not recognize your conference call software, it controls the system mute. That means you can use it for any and all types of software! 🤯

After installing this plugin, get the MuteDeck application from the MuteDeck homepage.
published_versions.release_notes: New action: Bring to Front, which will bring the Zoom, Teams, and others, to the front of your desktop, making them easier to find when you have a lot of apps open.

published_versions.subtitle: Check and control your status on Zoom and other apps.
published_versions.description:
Take control of your meetings with MuteDeck. Check and control your status on Zoom, Teams, Webex, Google Meet, and other apps. Quickly mute or unmute, toggle your webcam, start sharing, leave the meeting, and more! You can even define custom actions.

MuteDeck runs on Windows, macOS, and detects the status of conference call software. Currently, Zoom, Google Meet, and Webex are supported (with more to come). However! If MuteDeck does not recognize your conference call software, it controls the system mute. That means you can use it for any and all types of software! 🤯

After installing this plugin, get the MuteDeck application from the MuteDeck homepage.
published_versions.release_notes:
I'm excited to announce this update includes Custom Actions, a feature that allows you to send any keyboard shortcut to Zoom, Teams, Webex, or Google Meet. Yup, that's right. You can now do anything with Custom Actions!

Here's a few examples of how you could use Custom Actions: raise your hand, change to the gallery view, open the chat, and so many more!

There are also new Single Action buttons that can be used in multi-action buttons. These buttons do only one thing, like unmute, start or stop video, sharing, or recording. Remember, Single Action buttons don't show the current status, you can keep using the Toggle buttons for that.

published_versions.subtitle: Never be late again.
published_versions.description:
Never be late again. With the Clocks plugin, turn any key or touch strip into a digital timepiece. Personalize your display style, then switch time zones with a press or dial turn. No more converting world times, no more constantly checking your watch or phone clock. Instead, tell time with a quick glance at Stream Deck.

⁣

Key actions include:

✦ My Clock: Display a custom analog or digital clock

✦ World Clock: Display time zones around the world

⁣

Dial actions include:

✦ Choose between analog or digital displays

✦ Choose from over 30 clock appearance styles

✦ Switch between AM/PM and 24-hour format

✦ Change your default clock location

✦ Show or hide the date and weekday

✦ Personalize colors to match your style

✦ Add additional locations and time zones

✦ Start a countdown timer

✦ Make advanced changes using a built-in editor

⁣

You can even interact with your clock using a key press, a tap of your touch pad, or a turn or push of a dial.

⁣

Ready to evolve your timekeeping? Get the Clocks plugin for Stream Deck.
published_versions.release_notes: The initial release of Clocks by Elgato.

published_versions.subtitle: Records your Mouse Events
published_versions.description: Mouse Simulator Records your Mouse Events and plays them back when you press a button (pressing it again stops the current mouse events). Supported Events: Left-MouseButton, Right-MouseButton, Middle-MouseButton, X-MouseButton 4/5, MouseWheel (Focus dependent), X/Y Multi-Screen Mouse Coordinate and Auto-Delay. In addition, the recordings can also be implemented in your Games. The ｟WARP｠ Motion Option skips your mouse movements until the next click event. Soft Start brings smooth Playback. In addition, over 160 compatible (VirtualKeys) Keyboard-Shortcut Keystrokes are recorded and simulated again using the Typewriter Speed (Ghostwriter). Replay and Infinity Loop Playback Options allows repeating Sequences.
published_versions.release_notes: UX Optimization (Code Signing)

published_versions.subtitle: MS2 gaming dashboard and controller for ATS & ETS2
published_versions.description: MS2 gaming dashboard and controller for ATS & ETS2
published_versions.release_notes:
Important information:

For our plugin to be able to gather data from ATS or ETS2, you have to install the SCS Telemetry plugin.

This is a small DLL file that was developed in accordance with SCS Software guidelines and enables third-party software to communicate with their games.

This DLL file is available for download on our website, complete with installation instructions: https://www.mods.studio/stream-deck/

Version 4.0 changelog:
✦ Added support for Stream Deck +
✦ Added support for latest Stream Deck software
✦ Added compatibility with other SCS telemetry plugins
✦ Added support for uppercase keyboard keys
✦ New action: Differential lock
✦ New action: Suspension height (including SD+ variant)
✦ Added SD+ variant: Retarder
✦ Added SD+ variant: Cruise control
✦ Speed limit updated to vector graphics
✦ Speed limit has animated warning when speeding (PRO feature)
✦ Sleep action updated to vector graphics
✦ Sleep action icon now fills with blue color like in game
✦ Differential lock shows warning if going too fast (PRO feature)
✦ Fixed bug in range indicator when it showed km in ATS
✦ Fixed formatting of time displays to show hours and minutes
✦ Lift axle buttons re-made to reflect in-game truck dashboards

published_versions.subtitle: On Screen Display Tools
published_versions.description:
On Screen Display Tools, the essential Stream Deck plugin, offers a unique visual experience in multi actions (or stand-alone), empowering you with advanced capabilities for displaying information on your main computer display. This plugin allows you to display text and images on your screen for easy visualization of multi action execution, progress, or visual enhancement, providing an immersive and interactive experience.

Key features of On Screen Display Tools include:
🔅 Simultaneous Text and Image Display on your main display: Effortlessly show captivating text and stunning images on your screen while executing a multi action, enabling you to convey information and track your progress without looking at your Stream Deck.
🔅 Use for Visualization of your Multi Action Sequencing: Combine text and image display with a sequence of actions, such as switching scenes, starting/stopping recordings, launching applications, and more, all in your multi action button.
🔅 Rich Customization Options. Image, Font, Size, Color, and Nine Screen Positions.
🔅 Input Static Text with the On Screen Display action to add visual indicators in your multi actions.
🔅 Read from a File with the OSD File Reader action. Choose from the First line, the Last line, a specific Line Number, or let On Screen Display Tools pick a line at random.
🔅 Dynamic Content Updates: Display updated text on the fly with the File Watcher action, ensuring real-time information delivery and responsiveness to changing content. This action reads from a text file you define and displays any changes to the file on screen.
🔅 Dynamic Content Updates: Display updated text on the fly with the OSD File Watcher action, ensuring real-time information delivery and responsiveness to changing content. Read from a text file, you define, and display any changes to the file on screen. Live / On Air indicator: Display an indicator on your main display to alert others that you are currently live with the OSD Live / On Air - Toggle action.

Elevate your multi actions to new heights and unlock endless possibilities for your Stream Deck experience.
published_versions.release_notes: Initial release

published_versions.subtitle: HTML Head-up-Display
published_versions.description:
The transparent HTML Head-up-Display (HUD) allows to show a full-size web page in KIOSK mode on the desired monitor. Due to the compatibility of HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript there are no limits for the on-screen display (OSD).

The frameless Stage is your Gamechanger whether small Widgets, Crosshairs, Ruler, News-Ticker, Donations, Weather, floating-iFrames , PiP Movie-Player and much more.

The Fullscreen Chromium (cefsharp) based Web-Browser ignores optionally user input like Mouse clicks, and is optionally always in the foreground (Force-Top-Most), so it can be used for any situation.
published_versions.release_notes: Multi-Instance Support
