published_versions.subtitle: Arrange Windows Windows by Percentage
published_versions.description: Matrix-Display will make your Multi-Monitor life much easier! Arrange and Move Windows by Percentage. Make your desktop your Cockpit, arranging Windows-Apps has never been easier. The Plugin enables active Windows to be distributed to all available Monitors (Screen-Setup) based on the window title and Processname with the position percentage. Any number of matrix grid arrangements can be implemented via multi-actions and are always compatible with any monitor due to the percentage definition. The Expand option further refines the margin per window to allow for seamless positioning. Multiple desktop setups can be created using the Stream Deck Multi-Action option, predefined grids and layouts allow for a variety of zones on all connected monitors. The Windows Process Viewer Assistent helps you to determine the appropriate title caption. Geared for power users, Trading Dashboards, Window splitting, Workflow optimization, and much more. Core Features: Active Window, Specific any Window, Retries Wait Counter, Monitor ID Detection, Current Monitor Detection, Window Process Title Helper, Border Spacing, Realtime Icon Preview, Dynamic Icon Color, Confirm Audio Sound, Layout Presets, Splash-Screen Exclude, Simulation Window Helper.
published_versions.release_notes: Add Option Current Screen

published_versions.subtitle: Translate on-the-fly your currently selected text into your defined target Language
published_versions.description:
Translate on-the-fly your currently selected text into your defined target Language, and automatically paste the translated text in the same place from Clipboard. Currently the Plugin Support the © Google WebTranslate and DeepL-API (more Infos about the API-Key visit the InfoPage)

How it Works (KeyPress):
  • Plugin Translate the currently selected Text into your defined target Language...
  • ... and Store automatically the translated Text into your Windows Clipboard
  • Paste the translated Text via CTRL+V wherever you want
  • If the WHITNEY window stays open, a translation is started with each new CTRL+C selection (live translate)
  • Optional: Paste the translated Text automatically at the same selected place
  • Optional: Present the currently translated text in real time in a separate Post-Screen Whitney Window
Supported Languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino (Tagalog), Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish, Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Nyanja (Chichewa), Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal, Brazil), Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala (Sinhalese), Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog (Filipino), Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi (Akan), Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

published_versions.subtitle: Translate on-the-fly your currently selected text into your defined target Language
published_versions.description:
Translate on-the-fly your currently selected text into your defined target Language, and automatically paste the translated text in the same place from Clipboard. Currently the Plugin Support the © DeepL.com (more Infos about the API-Key visit the InfoPage)

⁣

Due to the nature of this plugin accessing the clip board and network it is often flagged by Anti-virus software. Please do not use this plugin with sensitive information.

⁣

The plugin requires an active subscription to the translation API.

⁣

How it Works (KeyPress):

  ✦ Plugin Translate the currently selected Text into your defined target Language...

  ✦ ... and Store automatically the translated Text into your Windows Clipboard

  ✦ Paste the translated Text via CTRL+V wherever you want

  ✦ Optional: Paste the translated Text automatically at the same selected place

  ✦ Optional: Present the currently translated text in real-time in a separate Post-Screen Window

⁣
  
Supported Languages: Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Estonian, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Latvian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Chinese

published_versions.subtitle: Easily control your Microsoft Teams meetings
published_versions.description:
With Stream Deck, you can easily control your Microsoft Teams meeting by setting keys to control your microphone and camera, or even send a reaction and raise your hand. This makes managing your Teams sessions a breeze.

⁣

Key Actions:

✦ Background blur: Toggle AI background blur and get that DSLR-like bokeh effect

✦ Camera: Easily turn your camera on or off

✦ Leave: Don't be the last to leave a meeting because you couldn't find the on-screen button

✦ Mute: Mute your mic exactly when you need to

✦ Raise hand: Speak up without fumbling with your mouse

✦ Reactions: Applause, laugh, like, wow

⁣

Tip: Organize your keys into Folders and Pages to keep your workflow smooth and easier to navigate.

Perfect Assistant to take your Presentation or ScreenRecording to the NextLevel. In addition, the spotlight works ingame for most games, you can really upgrade your standard crosshair. An interesting extension, especially for first-person shooters.

published_versions.subtitle: With ForceWindow onTop, you can force any window, any application, to be permanently in the foreground.
published_versions.description: With ForceWindow onTop, you can force any window, any application, to be permanently in the foreground. No matter whether you want to see a favorite VLC video as picture-in-picture or just want to keep the calculator in Excel on top, once activated, the window remains permanently in the Foreground. The Overlay option for Windows Software brings you completely new possibilities and options in KIOSK mode.

published_versions.subtitle: Meld Studio 💙 Stream Deck.
published_versions.description:
Meld Studio 💙 Stream Deck. Take your stream to new heights with powerful new capabilities at your fingertips. Trigger transitions, manage audio tracks, toggle filter effects on and off, and much more.

Now you see me, now you don’t: Things getting weird on the cat-cam? Quickly toggle visibility on any layer.
What the *****? Mute your microphone in a millisecond or precision adjust your audio inputs using the StreamDeck+.
End your 24 hour streamathon with a bang. Or just press the button to go offline.
Want to post your victorious boss battle (and not the 13 times you died trying)? Start and stop recordings or take a screenshot with the touch of a button - as many as you want.

And we're not done yet! We are continually working to bring you even more capabilities for this integration, so stay tuned for updates and new features.

published_versions.subtitle: i-net CoWork extension for Stream Deck
published_versions.description:
With the i-net CoWork extension for Stream Deck, meetings can be controlled easily and effectively. Even starting calls in the current channel is possible. There are no limitations to what you can do.  
⁣


Supported functions:

✦ Start / Leave Call: An audio call in the current channel can be started and also ended again.

✦ Start / Stop Camera: The webcam can be switched on and off in the active call.

✦ Mute / Unmute: The microphone can be muted and also turned on again in the active call.

✦ Silence / Clear: The complete audio input and output can be activated and deactivated.

✦ Raise Hand: In order to have your chance to speak in a meeting, you can raise your hand in the active call and lower your hand again.

✦ Send Reaction: All reaction emojis enabled on the server can be set as an action to fade in during a call.

✦ Online Status: The online status including a user-defined status text can be changed by pressing a button.

✦ Start / Stop Screenshare: Screen sharing in the active call (or as a new call without audio participation) can be started or ended. Note: After starting the sharing, the browser shows a selection of screens and windows. The content to be shared must still be selected and confirmed.
 
⁣


Setup:

✦ The operation of an i-net CoWork server version 23.4 or higher is required.

✦ The WebAPI as well as Token Authentication Plugin must be installed.

✦ The user needs the permission to access i-net CoWork, the WebAPI as well as the Token Authentication.

✦ A Bearer token must be added in the user account to allow access to CoWork.

✦ When setting up the actions in the Stream Deck, the connection to the i-net CoWork server must be set up once. This requires the server name (base address) as well as the created Bearer token.
published_versions.release_notes: Initial release

localizations.value:
Mit der i-net CoWork Erweiterung für das Stream Deck können Meetings einfach und effektiv kontrolliert werden. Selbst das Starten von Anrufen im aktuellen Kanal ist möglich.


Unterstützte Funktionen:

✦ Anruf: Es kann ein Audio-Anruf im aktuellen Kanal gestartet und auch wieder beendet werden.

✦ Webcam: Die Webcam im aktiven Anruf kann ein- und auch ausgeschaltet werden.

✦ Stummschalten: Das Mikrofon kann im aktiven Anruf stumm- und auch wieder eingeschaltet werden.

✦ Tonausgabe: Die komplette Audio-Ein- und Ausgabe kann aktiviert und deaktiviert werden.

✦ Melden: Um in einem Meeting zu Wort zu kommen, kann man sich im aktiven Anruf melden und die Hand wieder senken.

✦ Reaktionen senden: Alle auf dem Server freigegebenen Reaktions-Emojis können als Aktion eingestellt werden um diese während eines Anrufs einzublenden.

✦ Online Status: Der Online-Status inkl. eines benutzerdefinierten Statustext kann per Tastendruck geändert werde

published_versions.subtitle: Remote Control for OBS Studio
published_versions.description:
Pro production at your fingertips. With the OBS Studio plugin, go live or record directly from Stream Deck. Stop wasting time managing scenes, sources, and keyboard hotkeys. Instead run your video and audio on the fly, all with a key press.

Requires OBS Studio 27.0 or newer.

Key actions include: ✦ Record: Start or stop recording ✦ Record Pause: Pause an active recording ✦ Stream: Start or stop streaming ✦ Replay Buffer: Start or stop the replay buffer ✦ Save Replay: Save a replay of the active buffer ✦ Scene Collection: Switch to a scene collection ✦ Profile: Switch to a profile ✦ Scene: Switch to a scene ✦ Source: Show or hide a source ✦ Audio Mixer: adjust volume level, set volume level, toggle mute, push-to-talk & push-to-mute ✦ Media: Control playback for a media source ✦ Studio Mode: Turn Studio Mode on or off ✦ Transition: Push your preview scene live when in Studio Mode ✦ Filter: Show or hide a source filter ✦ Screenshot: Take a screenshot of the output scene ✦ Scene Transition: Switch the active scene transition

Dial actions include: ✦ Audio Mixer Volume: Turn to adjust volume and press or tap to toggle mute

Featuring real-time status displays. That means your key appearance changes with each press! Feeling creative? Try adding OBS to a multi action sequence! Multi actions combine several actions or plugins for special effects. For example, adjust the lights, show a source filter, and play a music track — all with a single key press. Create more, micromanage less. Get the official OBS Studio plugin for Stream Deck.
published_versions.release_notes: ✦ Improved action responsiveness when using large scene collections in OBS studio.

published_versions.subtitle: A.I. at your fingertips.
published_versions.description:
A.I. at your fingertips. Literally. With DeckAssistant, you can select text in any application and send it to our A.I. with a prompt, or bring up a freeform prompt window for endless possibilities. After receiving the initial response, you can continue your conversation online.

Prompting choices are endless, but here are a few examples: "Summarize this text", "Find bugs in this code", "translate this text to English", "write a polite decline for this email".

DeckAssistant is the ultimate productivity tool for Stream Deck, providing AI-powered features that simplify your workflow and save you time.
published_versions.release_notes: Tired of waiting? No more; DeckAssistant now responds instantly! No more waiting for long answers. With v3.0, DeckAssistant will reply as if the AI is typing back to you. Experience a seamless and lightning-fast response. ⚡️

published_versions.subtitle: Dynamic Search Island © brings you a whole new super fast internet surfing experience.
published_versions.description: Dynamic Search Island © brings you a whole new super fast internet surfing experience. Via the dynamic URL and your direct, focused input in the Island Spotlight input field, the website will be executed instantly with your search. Typing in the input field replaces your placeholder variable from your URL link and immediately executes the result in the new tab. You can instantly run a Google Maps route plan from your location, or search directly on amazon, ebay, facebook, booking, twitch.tv, bing, reddit, netflix, tiktok, yahoo, stock.adobe, shutterstock, youtube and many more. The possibilities are unlimited because the link is assembled individually and dynamically. The predefined presets enable a direct start.

published_versions.subtitle: Move your Cursor with the Stream Deck Buttons.
published_versions.description:
Move your Cursor with the Stream Deck Buttons. The Mouse Remote Interface Control gives you full control over your mouse. You can set up your own mouse joystick and shift the X/Y offset of your cursor with the press of a button. Repeated clicks or position information are possible at any time. You define the repeat loops and/or the waiting time between a mouse-down and mouse-up event as you wish. Mouse events can thus also be frozen and released again. The plugin turns your stream deck into a barrier-free remote interface controller.

Mouse Events: Left Click, Left Down (Hold), Left Up, Middle Click, Middle Down (Hold), Middle Up, Right Click, Right Down (Hold), Right Up, X1 Click, X1 Down (Hold), X1 Up, X2 Click, X2 Down (Hold), X2 Up, Scroll-Wheel V/H, Move Cursor, Reset Cursor Position (Center Screen), Set new Cursor Coordinates.

published_versions.subtitle: Use your Stream Deck to control and trigger Actions, change profiles
published_versions.description: Use your Stream Deck to control and trigger Actions, change profiles, and instantly change lighting for all your iCUE devices.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Sensor units have been added next to the sensor values

✦ Text edit component has been added to Cooling, Sensor, Profile, EQ, and Battery widgets

localizations.value: 请使用您的Stream Deck来控制和触发动作、更改配置文件并即时改变所有iCUE设备的灯光效果。
Verwenden Sie Ihr Stream Deck, um Aktionen zu steuern und auszulösen, Profile zu wechseln und im Handumdrehen die Beleuchtung bei allen Ihren iCUE-Geräten anzupassen.
Use your Stream Deck to control and trigger Actions, change profiles, and instantly change lighting for all your iCUE devices.
Utilisez votre Stream Deck pour contrôler et déclencher des Actions, modifier vos profils et instantanément changer l'éclairage de vos périphériques iCUE.
ストリームデックを使い、アクションを管理およびトリガ、プロファイルを変更、iCUEデバイスすべての照明を短時間で変更できます。
스트림 덱을 이용하면 액션의 제어와 트리거, 프로필 변경, 그리고 모든 iCUE 장치 조명의 즉시 변경과 같은 작업을 할 수 있습니다.
Utilice su Stream Deck para controlar e iniciar acciones, cambiar perfiles y modificar inmediatamente la iluminación de todos sus dispositivos iCUE.

published_versions.subtitle: Control multiple OBS Studio instances at the same time.
published_versions.description: Control multiple OBS Studio instances at the same time. Easily keep them synchronized or manage them individually. Stream, record, set current scene, toggle source visibility, mute audio, trigger hotkeys and much more. Advanced actions support any OBS Websockets protocol request.
published_versions.release_notes:
✦ Added long key press support

✦ Added option to hide target indicators

✦ Added option to set default target

✦ Fixed support for custom images/states

✦ Fixed feedback alerts sometimes getting overwriten

✦ Tweaked actions colors/icons

published_versions.subtitle: Control NETIO PDU power outputs (110/230V AC) by the Stream Deck keys.
published_versions.description: With NETIO PDU power control plugin for ELGATO Stream Deck you can control NETIO PDU power outputs (110/230V AC) by the Stream Deck keys. All types of NETIO power distribution units can be controlled from this plugin (PowerBOX with wall kind of sockets, PowerPDU with IEC C13 computer power sockets, DIN rail version even FLAT PDUs for installation behind TV. Every switch can control Output On / Off / Toggle / power restart on defined output. Sequences with delays also supported. Usage: switch several light scenes, switch additional audio amplifiers, remote restarting and many more...
published_versions.release_notes: Initial release

published_versions.subtitle: HDR Toggle for Windows 10+
published_versions.description:
HDR Toggle - Elevate Your Visual Experience 🌟 Discover a new dimension of visual excellence with HDR Toggle, the ultimate Stream Deck plugin that puts the power of High Dynamic Range right at your fingertips. 🌟 Unlock the Beauty of HDR with a Press of a Button!

Are you tired of digging through settings menus just to enjoy stunning HDR visuals? With HDR Toggle, you can now switch HDR mode on and off across all your supported monitors effortlessly. Transform your viewing experience in seconds! 🔅 Toggles HDR mode for all supported monitors. 🌈 Dynamic Visuals: Watch colors come to life as HDR Toggle enables the full spectrum of dynamic lighting, vibrant colors, and deep contrasts. 💎 Crystal Clarity: Experience razor-sharp details and lifelike textures that make every frame a masterpiece. 📈 Effortless Control: Toggle HDR with a simple button press on your Stream Deck, and watch as your monitors adapt to your preferences in real-time.

Always in the Know - Instant State Display

Stay in sync with your visual environment with HDR Toggle's intuitive status indicator. The button on your Stream Deck will always reflect the current state of HDR, so you're never left guessing.
published_versions.release_notes: - Now checks for HDR status when the button appears.

published_versions.subtitle: Drop Zone places floating storage pads freely on your desktop
published_versions.description: Drop Zone places floating storage pads freely on your desktop to copy or move files or entire folders directly to a specific location. With the date folder option you can automatically create a directory in the target folder in advance, for example to automatically sort by date. Individual parameters such as position or mouse events as well as the copy or move mode, as well as the colors, leave nothing to be desired. Speed up your workflow in Explorer or expand your backup strategy with the colored File-Manager filing pads. The copy or move process is carried out using the Windows internal copy function (Shell:API), practically as if you had done it manually and therefore you have full control over the process.
published_versions.release_notes: Initial release

published_versions.subtitle: Whack the peeping moles before the time runs out and try to beat your score!
published_versions.description: Whack the peeping moles before the time runs out and try to beat your score! Includes 3 predefined difficulty levels (easy/normal/hard) and a custom one that you can configure. Play limited-time games (5s/10s/20s/30s) or try the endless mode. Top scores for every level/time are saved so you can try to beat them
published_versions.release_notes: - First release. Includes 3 types of moles (+1/+2/-1 score), 4 difficulty levels (with one configurable), 5 game length modes and top scores
